name: @carbon/themes
description: Themes for applying color in the Carbon Design System

scripts.clean: rimraf es lib umd scss/_mixins.scss scss/_tokens.scss scss/_theme-maps.scss
scripts.build: yarn clean && bundler bundle src/index.js --name CarbonThemes && node tasks/build.js && yarn docs && bundler check 'scss/*.scss'
scripts.docs: node tasks/docs.js && doctoc --title '## Table of contents' docs
